718816f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

718818f-a.text:
(1)
Chrystie Street, west side, north from but not including Hester Street. Wrecking of buildings in process for clearing of site
for soosevelt Park.
August 28, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view.
September 5, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

718818f-b.folder: Chrystie Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

718819f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, east side, north from but not including Hester Street, to but not including Grand Street, showing bufldincs being
demolished for Roosevelt Park site.
July 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
718819f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

718815f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, west side, north from Hester Street. This view shows the site of Roosevelt Park, it also shows Forsyth Street, east side,
north from but not including Hester Street.
July 18, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
718815f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

718817f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, west side, north from and including Hester Street.
April 28, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
718817f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

718812f-b.text:
(1)
Chrystie Street, west side, south from Hester Street, to and including Canal Street. This view shows preliminary razing prio
to grading.
October 11, 1930.
W. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing grading, This site is now Roosevelt Park,
and was completed in 1934.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
